sentences.en: Agricultural production has changed to relative overproduction from product shortage in China.
sentences.cn: 我国农产品已由短缺变成相对过剩,农业发展受到需求的约束.

sentences.en: But prices of agricultural commodities are low because of overproduction.
sentences.cn: 但农产品生产过剩会造成其价格降低.

sentences.en: China has also had to reign in its overproduction dilemmas.
sentences.cn: 中国也必须在它的生产过剩困境中解脱.

sentences.en: Conclusion CaCC 1 may play an important role in mucus overproduction in asthmatic airway.
sentences.cn: 结论　CaCC1在哮喘患者气道上皮表达增加,可能与哮喘患者的气道黏液高分泌密切相关.

sentences.en: Corporate inventories have begun to rise sharply, mainly due to overproduction.
sentences.cn: 企业库存已开始急剧攀升, 主要原因是生产过量.

sentences.en: Four reasons: the domestic industry is likely to face some embarrassing situation overproduction.
sentences.cn: 原因 四: 国内有些行业目前可能面临生产过剩的尴尬局面.

sentences.en: Industry watchers point to the correction as a red flag for overproduction.
sentences.cn: 业内观察人士认为,价格的调整是表示产能过剩的危险信号.

sentences.en: Live pig appeared the symptom of overproduction.
sentences.cn: 生猪出现了生产过剩的苗头.

sentences.en: Overproduction and consequent low market prices for wine caused economic tremors.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒生产过剩及由此造成的市价低迷引起了经济波动。

sentences.en: The dip was caused by overproduction and ongoing price pressures.
sentences.cn: 降价是因为生产过剩产生的价格压力.

sentences.en: The economy had reached a stage of overproduction, or under - consumption.
sentences.cn: 经济进入生产过剩阶段, 也就是说消费力不足的阶段.

sentences.en: The price of sugar remains up, despite overproduction.
sentences.cn: 尽管生产过剩,糖的价格仍然很高.
有计划的食物生产过剩

sentences.en: They used to have milk lakes due to overproduction.
sentences.cn: 由于产量过剩,他们过去经常出现牛奶大量剩余的状况.

sentences.en: This excess fungal yeast irritates the scalp, causing overproduction of skin cells.
sentences.cn: 这过量的真菌酵母刺激皮肤产生了过多的皮肤细胞.

sentences.en: This process is necessary to overproduction.
sentences.cn: 要消灭过度生产这一步骤是必须的.

words.tran_cn: 伸得过远；（马）以后蹄踢前蹄
使人口过剩；使人口过密

trans.tran_en: the act of producing more of something than people want or need
